rule: If "CantAnswer" is chosen as the output, it must never signify the chatbot was unable to process; instead, it must imply a specific reason for failure.
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single part-of-speech tag, 'JJ', which is a valid tag according to the provided list in the description. The output adheres to the rule of returning only the part-of-speech tag.
OK
